name: You don't have to be a “content creator” to have a website. - Oh Hello Ana
content: So much this! Something along these lines has become my go-to when talking about personal sites. A personal site can be a simple "hello" on a single page. Then it can become whatever you like as time goes on, or not! It's all about you, not _influencing_, or _thought leading_. Just you. And maybe your cat.
